content.detailedDescription: I am a truck driver i was westbound on interstate 10 just east of deming new mexico.  i saw what i believe to be the border patrol blimp in the distance over some small mountains i rolled down my window and took a picture to see if i could get it in on film.  after  i took the first picture i looked at it and saw that i had captured the the image  of the object i am describing now.  i immediately within 20 seconds took a second photo of the same area and the object did not appear in the second photograph.  approximately 20 minutes later as i was still traveling westbound and on the west side of deming new mexico i observed the object again however this time it was much closer and  not a light but an actual vehicle.  i  took two pictures of it at that time and it did not appear in either one of the pictures.
content.summary: Taking photo of border blimp discovered object in photo

content.detailedDescription: I was in my backyard looking for comet lovejoy. i saw what i first thought was a shooting star just west of the pleiades moving north. it left a faint trail, but then i saw it continuing north. it was leaving more trail behind if but it was fading rapidly. the trail was thin and just barely visible. as i continued to watch, i could make out three greyish metallic spheres.They may have been flat instead of spherical, but because of the shading i got the impression of spheres. they were moving very quickly to the north but they arced to the northwest. i lost them as they passed just to the left of cassiopeia. they were in a very tight group. the overall size was just smaller than the pleiades. there may have been 4, but i was only certain of three. their formation was not triangular...If there had been 4 it would have made a nice square. from start to finish they were visible about 4 seconds or so. they were absolutely silent and extremely high up. the time was plus or minus 2 minutes.
content.summary: Three fast moving spheres

content.detailedDescription:
It was around 8:00 or 8:30 at night.  my neighbor and i had been sitting on my front porch talking.  he received a phone call, and went across the street to help the old lady who lives across the street from me.  i continued to sit on the porch.  

my attention was drawn by three very bright, large pulsating lights that appeared in a triangular formation pattern about 15 degrees from the ground, ascending and moving northward towards me from due south or ssw (the direction of tampa), possibly having just arisen from mcdill afb.  as a student of aerial phenomena since childhood, i knew that formation flight indicated that they were definitely not civilian aircraft.  but what would appear as bright pulsating balls?  as i watched, the orbs continued to ascend, moving northward toward me for several seconds (that seemed much longer).  i noted that there was a dusting of clouds at a level below the orbs, and wondered if the clouds created the pulsating effect of the light, or the "skipping" or "dipping" effect, as the objects appeared to be moving in a pattern similar to a boat going over waves.  they did not move in unison, though keeping in a triangular formation.  it did not appear that the changes corresponded to the pattern of clouds.  soon the globes were at least a 45 degree angle in the sky, when one of the globes turned upward and smoothly accelerated until it was a dot among the stars, then disappeared.  after maybe 20-30 seconds, another did the same.  after what seemed a longer interval, the third executed exactly the same maneuver, streaking into the sky as it shrunk to a point among the stars, continued to shrink to nothing.  during the time i watched the "objects", i tried to imagine what they could not be if not advanced craft.  before the ascension, the orbs were most like flares on parachutes... they bobbed around, pulsating brighter and dimmer and possibly changing color slightly several times a second, with the edges of the luminescence seeming sometimes pinkish, sometimes yellowish, sometimes silvery, very similar to viewing burning magnesium.  after watching 3 of them appear to shoot up in the sky at what seemed impossible speeds almost directly overhead, i cannot support the supposition they were flares. 

i have always wanted to see a ufo, but it was hard to feel very sure these were not some kind of flare until i very closely watched the 3rd one zoom upwards and disappear, after having observed the other two going through the same process.  i was not excited or agitated except that my neighbor didn't come outside quite in time to observe the last orb.   

my father was a fighter pilot in the usaf, and i hold a private pilot certificate.  i am familiar with aerial phenomena, but in all my years of watching, have never spotted anything as anomalous as this event.  on sitting on my front porch, i often see commercial aircraft leaving tpa, and do not experience any confusion about what i am seeing.

i hope you can notify me, at least in general terms if there are any other reports from last night similar to my sighting.
content.summary: Three glowing spheres were observed flying in apparent formation, then one-by-one they appeared to soar skyward, reducing in size to a point, then disappearing

content.detailedDescription:
Driving back from anaheim (we were in disneyland over christmas) heading north on i15 - still in california i believe when i looked in my rear-view mirror and saw an object hovering between the mountain peaks. it was massive. at first i thought it was a blimp but the shape did not fit. it was not a helicopter as there were no blades and the shape was wrong. it could not have been an airplane as it would have dropped out of the sky from stalling. the object slowly moved behind the mountain. a guy going south took a video of it and posted it on youtube - i found it by accident and as soon as i watched it i had chills going up my spine. he was going south we were going north. i saw exactly what he had filmed.

[link moved to fi section/cms/tg]

his video starts at 8:04 roughly
content.summary: Saw an object hovering between the mountains

content.detailedDescription: I was going to go out to see ufo when i heard loud flying objects flying over my apt. once outside i could see many helicopters flying towards it. ufo hovered while spinning slowly and blinking very bright lights. very pretty and very large. it stayed in same place for about 2 hours. then it went straight up and stayed at a higher elevation, not sure for how long. abc ran info on tv all evening. i think it was abc. they were to give us info at 11:00 news. at 11:00 they stated they did have confirmation of the event with chp. next day they reported that they were unsure what it was and the only facts they could dig up was that mather afb had never in it's history had so many craft flying in and out of base. then never heard of it again. i'm writing this now because on sci channel, their program ufo conspiracies s1/ep04, ufo swarm, shows these two woman and one boy who saw same kind of ufo. theirs was close to ground and blowing flames out the bottom. the one i saw didn't have flames but maybe because it was higher up and didn't need to. also they one they saw wasn't flashing different colored lights. it was exact shape and was bright, like the one i saw. i'm sure it's the same kind. i felt good watching this ufo. i kind of thought it or someone on board might have noticed me. it would have been easy to see me. i only felt this way for a short time. i did get a feeling that there was a brief connection somehow with it. hard to explain. did not have any ill effects from sighting. wish i'd had a pic of it. funny thing is i never thought to take one. not like me either. i might not have thought to because i was sure the word and plenty of evidence would be forth coming. lost sight when i finally went to bed.
content.summary: I was watching a movie on abc when a ticker tape ran across bottom of screen saying that 12 people had called in and reported ufo over mather afb. i the realized that i could probably see it myself from my second floor balconey.

content.detailedDescription:
I don't know if this is where to report this type of sighting but wasn't able to find another site. i have taken numerous ufo sightings, videos, still photos from this property have reported them as well as having seen them in both daylight and at night and from above and nearby the site ever since i purchased the property. i now have hundreds of photos, many in great detail, of the craft and if it is of any interest i will pass some of them along to those who want them. i will give mufon the email site or they can get them from me and i'll let them send them on.  

recently, i have mounted a trail camera located at the south end of my property/back yard that takes in the area for about 80 yards. 

at 7:09:27 pm some movement triggered the camera which is set to take three (3) photo burst with a 10 second delay. at night the film is black & white and the light projected is invisible to both animals and humans.

i am inclosing two photos (one is the original and the other is an embossed of the original photo). the light ray set the camera off and i will let the observer determine what the ray of light is. i have also enclosed the embossed photo so that an observer can see that the light ray apparently has some depth.

the camera worked perfectly since my wife and dog later caused the camera to function when walking nearby within the same time period but minutes before and after.

also, the camera apparently took photos at 9:29:37 thru 9:29:56pm and all that was recorded was a bright white light that totally blanked out the six (6) photos that were all taken in succession.  

during the entire time all the photos were taken no noise, vehicle or aircraft was heard and that can be verified due to my wife having been outside at the time of the first photo burst. no light was observed at the time.
content.summary: These pics were taken by a trail camera placed to observe my back yard

content.detailedDescription: I set up a moultrie m-880i digital game camera for the 1st time in a spot to see what i would get pictures of. the location is at my moms place.  i set the camera for 8mp and to take 3 shots 1 second apart when motion is detected. i got 1 amazing picture! at 1st i thought it was a large bird like a turkey vulture. after looking at the picture zooming in and out by far the most i have ever examined a picture in my life there is nothing that tells me that it is a bird of anything other than a ufo. several others believe pretty much the same. at the time i was home sleeping and my mom was at home in the house. but where anyone was at the time doesn't matter. all that matters is that the camera got 1 amazing shot. i am completely amazed by this picture. i sure wish i would have gotten a 12mp camera.  as far as a witness goes is it safe to say that the camera is the 1?  at this time i am not going to submit the picture. i want to 1st find out if it is worth $$$. i 1st want to get a response from mufon. and i swear on a stack of bibles that this is not a hoax. i hope to here from you soon.
content.summary: 1 picture-amazing!

content.detailedDescription:
It was about 7:30 pm. i went outside and looked up and noticed a patch of sky that was clear. as the clouds moved i noticed at the edge of the cloud cover i noticed very bright blue/white light flashed. at first i thought maybe it was a meteorite, no tail or anything just a very bright flash. as i continued to look in the area i saw additional flashes. they seemed random, there was no pattern or rhythm to them at all. not like a plane where there is an obvious rhythm to it. 
after about 20-30 seconds or so of watching a jet flew over head. at first i thought they were going to collide but then realized that the flashes seemed to be below the jet. i continued to watch that part of the sky and probably saw about three more flashes after the jet was gone, but they seemed to be slightly to the right (or north) of the previous ones. they were still in the same relative area. one of the flashes seemed almost an orange, however the rest were more blue/white in color. the last one was fainter than the previous ones i had seen. it appeared much more fuzzy or hazy. i know it wasn't a plane or helicopter. i live close to san jose international airport, so i know what planes look like. this was not a plane. 
as for how i felt, i would say more curious and excited than anything. there didn't appear to be any form to it, or structure to it at all. just a lot of flashes of light, varying in color, intensity and location (but only slightly).
content.summary: Bright flash star like in appearance. just above clouds. as clouds cleared i saw them. not sure if it was one object that moved somewhat or if there were multiple objects.

content.detailedDescription:
I was watching tv in bed and saw a bright orange globe through my bedroom windows located at the peak of the roof.  i am use to seeing the moon and stars from that window but this was neither of those.   the fact that is was moving caught my eye so i got up and walked to my balcony maybe 8 steps away and by that time it had already moved to the center of the horizon above the ocean.   the object travel in a straight line and i watched for almost 90 seconds then went to get my camera but when i returned it was completely out of site.  

i am sure it was not a aircraft or helicopter and the reason i know this is because i lived behind the los alamitos joint training force base for ten years and observed many aircraft and helicopters in flight both during the day and night time including heavy lift operations.


i am also a ex-navy submariner and stood look numerous times over a ten year period of service and never saw any object like this.


[name romoved/cms/tg]
content.summary: I was watching tv in bed and saw a bright orange globe through my bedroom windows located at the peak of the roof.  i am use to seeing the moon and stars from that window but this was neither of those.

content.detailedDescription: Sunny day object caught light from the sun at an approximatet distant of 500ft to a mile theb slowly headed s west second time uv seen it almost exactly two years apart in signings did exact same thing last time
content.summary: Secdont time iv seen it almost exactly two years ago last sighting reflects light then slowly disapears

content.detailedDescription: I saw this object in my photo
content.summary: I saw this object in my photo

content.detailedDescription:
Reported to me by my granddaughter.

westbound from san antonio, tx on 2/6/15 on us 90. she ws looking to her left from the passenger window an observed an orb to the left of the sun with the naked eye. she took a photo. next, the orb got brighter and a second orb appeared to the left of the first one.
content.summary: Observed with naked eye then photographed with galaxy s5. orb brightned then second one appeared

content.detailedDescription:
I was at my university accommodation and was getting ready for bedtime. i went out of the room and noticed the object in the sky. 

when i first looked at it, i instantly realized it was not an airplane, not iss, not an iridium satellite or any other satellite because the characteristics of the light were not those of reflection. the local time was also not in the range within which the satellites are visible. 

the light emanating from the object seemed to be pulsating at regular interval of around 1.3 s. it moved in a path and faded out of sight. 

i felt amazed and excited to see an unidentifiable object and rushed back to my room to grab my phone, and then i started filming the object.
content.summary: Indiscernible flashing light moved in a path and faded out of sight

content.detailedDescription: On 2/6/2015 at approximently 1:15am - 1:30am i went outside my residence to smoke a cigarette. i stepped off my porch and happened to look up and there it was a object on fire in the sky, as i blinked and said what the heck is that i looked up again and it was a bright white light it hovered like it knew i was staring at it, i got scared but curious so i ran inside to get my phone to take pics and some binoculars. as i came back out it had moved slowly into the night sky, it was glowing orange/yellow it was on fire. my brother once told me about chinese candles so that was my first instinct on what it was. but it kept on moving farther and farther into the sky changing colors like fire does. i then started taking video but my hands were so shaky (its not the best video, but you can see the colors change.)when i couldn't find it thru my video camera on my phone i got the binoculars out and i spotted it again. by this time you could not see it with the naked eye only with binoculars. as you can see in pics there is the moon,the fireball and a planet. my reactions were what the heck is this i am scared, but curious. i wanted to call someone but it was too late. i lost sight after i couldn't find the object thru my binoculars. i then went to sleep and the next day told everyone i knew about what i saw and showed them pictures & video. i already reported this but couldn't get my pics to this website, i am now using my pc and can add pics and video.
content.summary: Saw fireball outside my porch, watched it as it moved higher in the night sky

content.detailedDescription: I was hiking at topanga state park heading my way to back toward my car. took a moment to gaze at the bright full moon when suddenly something compelled me to turn my head and that's when i noticed of in the distance 3 glowing objects in a triangular formation. they were stationary for about couple minutes but eventually started floating west of the san fernando valley. i felt astonished that i was witnessing this event and dismayed when i tried recording the objects with my iphone but the battery was dead. i should mention it had 40% battery last i checked. it was soon after that these ufo's disappeared from the sky.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 3 ufo's flying over topanga canyon ave

content.detailedDescription: I walked out of my house which is approximately 1 mile from blue mountain, which is a strip of mountain along the appalachian mountain range. i looked up in the sky and saw a few blinking red lights. myself and two othes witnessed this. i watched as a few red lights turned into 5. the highest one was changing direction while one in the back caught up and stopped right beside another red orb. these objects were changing speeds and direction independent of one another. i have it all recorded on my cell phone.
content.summary: 5  blinking red orbs moved at different velocities high above a mountain range.

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving my house driving across the street when i noticed bright lights in front of me. so i pulled forward and parked to figure out what it was. i thought it might be a large cargo plane from luke airforce base. as i realized it wasn't shaped like a plane and that it had way to many lights i grabbed my phone to take pictures. it was hovering above the hills where it sloped down. it was moving forward. and my last picture of it before it vanished was a strange orb which likes like a face screaming.  it's in the same place as the object and i tried to see where the object went and couldn't see anything.  i even tried driving near the back of the hills and still no sign of it. i never seen anything like it. it had so many lights and they were.Red,orange and yellow. it really freaked me out.
content.summary: Saw craft hovering above hills by my house w/ bright lights along the whole width of object. took a couple of pics but the lights were so bright it looks like a one big like. the last pic of the object was a strange orb with a face as it disappear

content.detailedDescription: Driving home heading south east me and my wife noticed a strange huge light hovering we pull over to see if it will act as air craft, but this ufo stay the same positions no movement it then started to behave strange it would flashed complete off as if it was never there, and then turn up very bright as if it was testing its own lighting system. so i then started to record the event that was when i was able to obtain the behavior on camera the object turn off the lights as if it was never there 2mint into record less my feelings were amazed
content.summary: This ufo appear to stay stationary and flashed sequentially

content.detailedDescription: Before work i was smoking a cigarette, i look up and see three stars,  i know seven sister, big dipper, and orion,  i see a  triangle,  i have never seen this before,  they looked like stars,  same light.  the star at the  right slowly droped then took a left,  it droped again.  then shot off to the right it crossed the sky in 3 to 4 seconds.  today my wife and myself were there at 5: 55 am and the other stars that make the triangle, they were not there.  so there were 3 space ships there. now i'm in the club.
content.summary: Triangle   moving space ship.

content.detailedDescription:
I kept feeling that night and night before , ppl hurting me attacking my mouth
my mouth now moves by itself they mimicked this when they took me. now i cant control my mouth much like i used to . they said they wanted my other features to control what i have 
its awful and very painful cuz they tease you till i shoo them but nothings there im already back in ur home and thats when i saw the sightings three different types and were three different types of creatures laughing at me while teasing me saying how much they want woman power think they mean femininity.
they dont stop till ur mouth or the body part is controlled by them 
u have no control over ur self 
even films i took show my mouth being moves by its self 
it opens by itself and mumbles by it self 
i cant explain the pain its like a fun thing to em i guess see what they can take or control.. show off ..
they wont stop cuz 
the nightmares of man screaming at me wheres the power i want that power...Over n over when i wake nothings there accept mouth is very sore and cut up on inisde and now 
they seem to have got some control over my mouth i dont know how 
only happens when im asleep and ripped from sleep evcery 2 hours and tormented over my mouth 
i dont understand what im seeing when my mouth moves by itself 
how they did it 
besides the taunt and torment and torture
content.summary: 3 of them hovered near my home and i was arttacked still sore today and moving from here for good

content.detailedDescription: I had been camping on a friends property in a very remote area of the county for about a week and kept hearing odd noises in the woods of in the distance. very odd calls that sounded like they could be a odd animal or ?? i could also hear a motor running out in the woods that sounded like a idling atv but never saw a headlight or tail light. one evening before dusk i decided to go out in the woods near a far corner fence line and sit up in a tree stand used for hunting deer in the fall and see if i could see what was in that corner of the woods at night after it got dark. i remained up in the tree stand well after the sun set approx two hours after sunset. there are no lights within a half mile of this spot in the woods. the moon had not come out yet and it had gotten so dark that i could not even see my hand placed directly in front of my face. i heard the sound of a horse whinnying it was coming from directly below me. i was in a thick area of the woods and knew it was very unlikely for a horse to of gotten into that area given it was private property, fenced in and not used by anyone except for deer hunting in the fall. i didn't plan on staying out there that long into the night and did not have a flash light i did however have a bic lighter so i lit it so i could plan my way down out of the tree to investigate the horse sound. i then climbed out of the tree and when i got to the ground started to head through the very thick brush in the direction of a mowed trail that i could take back to my camp site. i was feeling ahead of me with my arms out straight ahead and moving through the brush sometimes on my hands and knees. then the orb appeared about ten feet off the ground and about ten feet behind me. it was a very bright light. it was hovering and moving in the same direction as me but i did not feel like it was after me just following me. it was very bright but offered no light that would light my way. it was still so dark i could not see or find the trail. by now the moon had just crested the horizon in the east which is the direction of my camp i just ran through the woods toward the crested moon stumbling on fallen trees and into light brush each time i fell i looked back and it was still hovering but never got closer than ten feet from me. as i got close enough to camp there was enough light from my fire that i could run at full speed. which i did! when i reached the camp site it was gone. since that day i have dug metal out of my cheek the back of both hands the back of my neck and the base of my spine. there is also a lump under my left eyebrow that wasn't there before. i really didn't think the tiny hair like but very long wires that came out of my check and the back of my hand were related to that day. i couldn't explain it and anyone i try to explain it to makes me feel like a psycho. the more i think about it and put that and other events that have happened since that night in the woods together i'm beginning to see how they are all related to a extraterrestrial something. lol would like to talk with someone familiar with these types of events to i can get it off my chest and hopefully get an explanation for it all.
content.summary: I was climbing down out of a tree stand in a very secluded area of the county when it appeared.

content.detailedDescription: Stepped out on the porch and i thought it was the north star it was so bright. then realized i was facing east where the sun comes up in front of my house. i then noticed the light moved. sometimes slightly but a couple of times rather quickly and would change direction. my fiancé brought out binoculars and i then saw through the binoculars what looked like the object come apart into 2 circles and then merge back together. the object/light was pretty high in the sky but there were no clouds. the object may have spun about a couple of times  but i couldn't be for certain as it was far away. i have been looking outside periodically and a after approximately 2 hours, it is still there, but has progressed more toward the south. i am quite nervous with it being within view of my house and think i could be in shock as i can seem to think of little else and i continually go outside to see where it is.
content.summary: At first thought it was a star but then it would move and stop.  at one point seemed to make 2 circles then came together again. i white lights pulsates

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving my brothers house just after midnight. i also want to point out i live near midway airport so i know the difference. as i was leaving i looked up and seen 3 weird orange like lights from the west headed to northeast of my brothers house they were lower than normal planes would be and when i looked at them with the naked eye it reflected a triangular light back at me which was very odd. they moved very fast and werent going very straight. they kind of swerved around as they moved in the general direction they were heading. so the first set came in 3 then the next 4 came in sets of 2 not far off of the others. i have some video and pictures beacause i tried both, but the last 2 i got the best video which still is not very good like a real camera would pick up. also with the iphone i could not tell if i was getting it because the phone screen was black. but i hope you guys can zoom in and see what it really is. please let me know what you find
content.summary: Seen 7 orb like lights

content.detailedDescription:
I was on a weekend trip in the back country near ricketts glen pa.  we drove into the woods and parked the car.  we did not find the trail head we had initially set out for but set off anyway.  we hiked a few miles up the mountain before the trail ended where a tree had fallen.  we walked around and observed evidence of mountain lion den.  we had observed remains on the trail and spider holes on the ground in the area of the den.  there we left a blaze on a tree and left the trail in search of a suitable over night location.  we used a google earth image and a compass to navigate the woods to a cliff which we identified on the image.  here we set up on a large out cropped rock and began establishing a site. it was still early in the afternoon and there were few clouds in the sky. while we rested on the rock i looked up and first observed the star like object; which momentarily appeared to be stationary, but quickly began to move in apparently unnatural manner toward the tree line across the sky and over and behind us.  it did not move fast and appeared to just cruise on a vector.  the motion was smooth and with out sound or acceleration.  it did not appear to be very high at this time.  at first i did not exclaim or make my observation known because i still questioned if it was real because it was so unnatural to me.  after a few moments it reappeared high above us, travelling parallel to the tree line now and not in the direction it had disappeared originally.  at this moment i exclaimed "o man, i see it."  at which time my two companions looked upward to try and observe what i had.  my male companion was unable to see it through an over hanging pine and my other companion saw it immediately and explained she had observed them before and just ignores them.  my other companion did not make an effort to change his perspective and was never able to observe the object. i continued to watch for several minutes as the vehicle flew at rapid speed in and out of my view.  it would disappear on one side of the horizon and reappear on another side.  it did this several times, almost as if to impress upon us its ability.  it made a final pass parallel to the tree, high in the sky, and i focused hard on the object attempting to see it more clearly.  i was able to make out the appearance of a tear drop shape with the widest end forward.  it appeared to be slightly a-symmetrical however, and also appeared to be spinning around the axis of travel.  after this pass the object disappeared.   

i also find it relevant to include that i had experienced a close encounter of another kind several years earlier but was unable to explain it at the time.  this inspired several years of research on my part, which included learning of possible telepathic et's.  in the days before this event i had throught heavily about my past experience, the presence of et's on our planet, and mentally requested, if at all possible, a visit of this kind.  in the moments before i glimpsed upward it had occurred to my mind that it was possible they could be near. the object remained in my site, until only a short moment after i mentally acknowledged i had seen enough.  during the time it was above us i did not think or speak,only observed.  the male party that did not see the object is my closest friend and my female companion, who did also observe it, was my romantic partner.  she is an educated, open minded, and highly empathetic individual.  i have a degree in engineering, and had done previous research on this subject.  it may also be relevant to include, given the social context of our species, to include that i am of northern european descent and my partner's origins are of south west africa.  this was my first sighting, and i have not been contacted since.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: We were hiking back country and left the trail.  used a compass to navigate to the edge of cliff for the night.  we sat a while and i looked up and saw it. it begun moving in a vector out of sight.  it returned several times in different directions.

content.detailedDescription: A buddy and i were heading to big rapids from lapeer for the weekend. we left around 9-9:30. 10-15 after taking the us 96 exit i noticed two extremely bright lights low in the sky above the road in front of us. the only reason it caught my attention was because it was extremely cloudy out. as we drove closer we realized that we were getting closer to the brighter of the two lights and that it was almost directly over the road(100-150ft high). it had blinking red and white lights on the outside and bottom of the craft. we eventually drove under the craft and that's when i noticed that it had boomerang shaped wings and and was hovering motionless above us not making a sound. after passing the first craft we started getting nearer to the second light(unknowing that it too would be an unexplainable craft). it wasn't as close to us as the first one and was above the trees to our left but as we came closer to it i realized that it was dome shaped and had yellowish lights spinning around it. once we passed it it changed direction and proceeded to head in the opposite direction. the third one was also on our left about three minutes after seeing the second craft. this one was a lot darker but it had three red lights on all points of the triangle shaped craft. after several moments went by it disappeared out of the blue.
content.summary: Saw three ufo's above us 96 heading towards grand rapids. drove directly under the first one. all three had their own unique characteristics.

content.detailedDescription: Together with my mother we were tracing airplanes with flightradar24.Com web site. at the same time i was recording them with using sony hdr-cx305 camera. after couple of months i was going to erase videos from my hard drive. in one of videos i saw some strange fast moving objects. after that i started to analyse all the videos from that day. i recorded nearly 40 orbs/ufos at that time. most of them were flying on the same direction, straight line, around 10x faster than plane.
content.summary: Multiple fast moving objects recorded on camcoder.

content.detailedDescription:
The night before my incident. i met up with my mother at a coffee house. just as we were leaving walking to our cars, i saw something out of the corner of my eye, as i turned to see a fireball/comet falling from the sky. i said quickly to my mom. oh my gosh mom look up.. do you see that!? she said yes denise i do. she then told me she has never seen a shooting star like that before. i kinda giggled at her because i have seen many in my life. this one looked to big to be a shooting star . it literally fell for at least 8-10 seconds glowing red and green colours. wow, it was cool to watch.. we hugged and parted ways. the next day i'm getting ready to go to sleep. it's around midnight or just after. i close my curtain just over half way, get into bed. i have my back turned away from the window and facing my closet which is opposite to my window. i  had my eyes closed for a moment when i noticed these bright green lights so bright that i could see them through my closed eyelids. semi freaked out i decide to open my eyes to see what was going on in my bedroom. sure enough the lights were in my bedroom bright green and dancing around my room. reminded me of the northern lights that i've seen on tv. so i just laid there quite looking up at this crazy weird light show. all of a sudden the lights that were dancing around came together making an orb like ball that hovered over my head for at least a minute. i started praying to my nana to protect me from whatever i was witnessing. the green orb started moving away from over top of my head then went back to the dancing swirling green lights that i first saw. don't ask me how but i was so nervous as to what i just saw. i remember telling myself just close your eyes and go to sleep. besides i wasn't getting out of my bed after seeing that. 
i woke up in the morning to go to work. my sister who lives down the street was calling me that morning and couldn't get through to me on my home line. every time see would call i would pick the phone up and it would be a dead line. later she told me that my answering machine wouldn't  pick up for her to leave a message. for about a month i had problems calling certain people and some no problem. i ended up calling the tv and phone company and asking them to see if this problem could be fixed. he did tell me that something had zapped my lines. but couldn't tell me anymore about it. 
crazy eh. ?
nothing has happened again to me like that since.
content.summary: Bright green lights that took over my room then formed a green orb that hovered over me

content.detailedDescription:
Feb. 7. about 2230-2330 eastern time. about an hour of watching this fly by. 
8 of us saw about 20 plus orange ufo orbs flying south. for about an hour. steady flying. 
first 3. then came 2 more then 2-3 more and kept coming. lost count at 20. saw them north west. flying south. they would dim out to nothing. when they came close to clearwater airport. and coastgaurd base.  a few dimmed out and just stoped. siting there. through binoculars looked like a black dot. all started as orange balls. a steady convoy in the air. it was amazing. 
these where not airplanes or helicopters. ect. 
however there was comercial aircraft in the air at the time. 
these orange balls where not convetional air craft. no way. 
i have seen them before at this location. 
about two years ago i saw an orange ball ufo pull up behind a coastgaurd c130 and follow it for about a two or three mins. in the day time. 
this is the fourth siteing of these orange ball ufo's
and i have seen different looking ufo's also. 
you may call me for more detail. 
im writing this from my phone. its hard to type on a phone.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: For about  an hour we saw 20 plus red/orange  ufo's heading south. not planes or helicopters. dimmed out.Stoped  in air. ect.

content.detailedDescription: Around 11:30 at night i was trying to get my son to bed, he's been congested and not sleeping well. after giving him some benadryl i took him upstairs to his crib. i then went down stairs turned the lights off in my kitchen and the tv off in my living room. i proceeded to my bedroom where i turned the lamp off on my wife's side of the bed, since mine has a bulb out i always use her side. as soon as i turned the lamp off i started to walk around the bed to my side, that's when i noticed two bright lights through our skylight window. they were very odd looking, solid red/orange lights which at first i thought might be an airplane. at that moment there were two side by side which the one on the right was starting to dimm as if were moving away (north) followed by the one on the left seconds later. this lasted approximately 10-15 seconds from when i first noticed them. after i could not see them anymore i got in bed. still thinking about what i saw and stairing out our skylight window i then saw another red/orange light, this one seemed closer than the first two i saw. it was heading north on a straight path, it's hard to say how close it was, but was not moving like any man made object. the best description would be an orb. i then grabbed my phone and went out my back door trying to get a video of it. i took a short video noticing one after another appearing in the south and heading north. it was pitch black and i felt as if my phone was not going to capture what i was seeing. i ran back inside and got my digital camera. taking still photos of several of them. this whole event lasted about 5 minutes. most of the photos look like nothing but zooming in after its sheets some weird things. a couple of photos that i took show lines as if you were writing your name in the sky with a sparkler. i know other people in the neighborhood saw this too, i heard in the distance of someone saying what is that. as an estimated guess i saw about 10-15 separate orbs.
content.summary: 10+ red/orange lights observed traveling n to s. appearing out of nowhere and changing directions like no man made object could.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking west with the dogs on a residential street. i saw 2 stars but then said to myself,"no there should only be one star up there. what the heck, it's changing colors. it's a ufo." i saw a lavender blue light change to a green light while stationery. then it changed back to lavender and moved downward to the south at a sharp 45 degree angle then back north staying parallel with the horizon. i have never seen an airplane change colors nor move like this did. (i have over 25 years of business in aviation) i thought maybe it could be a helicopter but they don't move like this did. i dragged the dogs home and yelled at my wife that there was a ufo outside and went back outside. it was stationery with a light lavender color. as the sun was coming up the light was losing it's intensity. it changed to lavender and started moving north. we could no longer see it due to our trees block the view. i was in awe.
additional witness wife - i was on the couch with my computer tablet when my husband came in exclaiming there was a ufo. i thought he was joking but saw the dogs still had their leads on and that he had gone back outside. i joined him and looked west a saw a bright white star. i asked if that was it and he said yes. i questioned him again to make sure i was seeing the same thing he was seeing. it was the only thing i could see in the the sky and i was unimpressed thinking it was venus. i asked him if he was sure it wasn't venus and he said, "yes, it changed color and it moved."
i observed a stationary bright white light, not twinkling like a star and it was between 20-30 degrees above the horizon. i trust my husband so i stayed and watched; barefooted in my pajamas (49 degrees outside). while watching i was trying to figure out how to work the camera on my tablet. i took a couple of pictures. then the object suddenly (as when you turn on light switch) turned the deepest prettiest lavender. it was a flat light. right after the color change it moved north until i could no longer see it due to the trees. when it started moving i changed the camera to video. we moved to where we could see past the trees but no longer saw the object. this event was a "wow". that is the only word that comes to mind to describe how i felt - wow. that sight of that lavender light is staying with me. i grew up on and near military bases and i have never seen anything like this. i checked my tablet camera and was very disappointed. my amateurish-ness and inexperience with the tablet/camera is shown very well. plus i was excited while trying to walk on sticks and stones with my barefeet. in the picture look towards the middle. you may need to magnify the pic. there is a white light. at that time -6:45 a.M. it was darker outside than it appears in the picture. the video is very short and very bad. you will need to look to the right of the bottom branches. there you will see the bright light moving north.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Changing colors, movement bright light.
